title: Chests
summaries: Chests are storage items that each hold up to 40 item stacks in rows of [img:Desktop version] 10×4 / [img:Console version] [img:Mobile version] 8×5 / [img:Nintendo 3DS version] 5×8 / [img:Old-gen console version] 5×4 (only 20 item stacks). Chests can be broken with any pickaxe or drill, but only when empty. It is impossible to destroy the blocks underneath a placed Chest that contains items.

In addition to being craftable, a number of Chests are created during world generation, and placed in random map locations. The loot contained in these Chests is determined during world generation, and will not change if the world enters <linked>Hardmode</linked>.

There are 20 varieties of naturally-occurring Chests (15 of which cannot be crafted) and 27 craftable ones, plus the <linked>Barrel</linked> and <linked>Trash Can</linked>, for a total of 42 Chest types and 44 placed storage items overall (besides <linked>Dressers</linked> and portable storage items).

There is a maximum limit of (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 8000 / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 1000 placed storage items in each world (excluding portable storage like the Safe, Piggy Bank, Void Vault(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions), and Defender's Forge(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions), as well as showcase items like the Item Frame, Weapon Rack, and Mannequin). Attempts to place additional storage items beyond the max will result in a dropped item, rather than placement.

On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop, [img:Console version] Console, [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console, and [img:Mobile version] Mobile versions, placed Chests can be renamed (20 character max). Hovering the cursor over a renamed Chest will show its name. If the Chest has not been renamed, no name will display. To rename a Chest, first open it via ⚷ Open / Activate. The default Chest name reflects the Chest type (e.g. a Living Wood Chest has the default name "Living Wood Chest"). Select "Rename" and enter a new name. Press ↵ Enter or press "Save" when finished. Chest names can also use the same text formatting as Announcement Boxes and chat messages.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile</linked>, some types of Chests can be locked by the player using a <linked>Chest Lock</linked>. When doing so, they will require a <linked>key</linked> to open again.

statistics.Buy: 3 GC (Golf Chest)
